Hero.description: Front-end Developer graduated in Computer Engineering, with 3+ years of experience. I have been prominently engaged at MB Labs for over a year, contributing to large-scale projects and working with advanced technologies. I possess strong skills in CSS frameworks (Chakra UI, Bootstrap, Ant Design), Redux, Zustand, Context, Next.js, Server Components, React Query, and other technologies related to React. I am always committed to improving my front-end skills. Welcome to my webpage, where I share knowledge and projects!

descriptions.B&T: Front-end Developer at B&T, a technology company operating in the foreign exchange market. I work on the development of a payment management system using React, JavaScript, Redux, and Material-UI.
descriptions.Cinemark: Front-end Developer at Cinemark, a company in the cinema industry. I work on building applications using Next.js 13, Chakra UI, React Query, and Zustand.
descriptions.CargoPlace: Front-end Developer at Cargo Place, a company in the freight transportation industry. I work on building applications using Next.js, Context API, and Chakra UI.
descriptions.Arco: Front-end Developer at Arco, a company in the education sector. I work on building applications using Next.js, Context API, and Chakra UI.
descriptions.Marvin: Full Stack Developer at Marvin, a company in the real estate market. I work on building applications using React, JavaScript, Redux, and Material-UI.
descriptions.Zap: Back-end Developer at Zap, a company in the delivery industry. I work on building applications using Node.js.
